remarks: The join of a co-atom (hyperplane) and an element not under it is the lattice unit.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2012.)
statement:
lhpj1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpj1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpj1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpj1.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
lhpj1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpj1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) ) -> ( W .\/ X ) = .1. ) $.
